results.content: When you look at the course name it looks like a good match. However, for someone who does not know anything about coding the course is hard. There should be more examples.
results.content_html: When you look at the course name it looks like a good match. However, for someone who does not know anything about coding the course is hard. There should be more examples.

results.content: This is a great course for absolute beginners. However an understanding of javascript is useful in order to appreciate the usability of React.
results.content_html: This is a great course for absolute beginners. However an understanding of javascript is useful in order to appreciate the usability of React.

results.content: This tutorial is excellent for the absolute beginners, as the course title says. It explains the basics and makes you understand each topic briefly. I really like it.
results.content_html: This tutorial is excellent for the absolute beginners, as the course title says. It explains the basics and makes you understand each topic briefly. I really like it.

results.content: Audio quality is bad (picking up too much noise), english is not the best, it looks like the guy is reading from the paper, hes really slow with typing and explaining, he is repeating alot of the same stuff, every video beings with the same introduction (that gets really annoying when you want to watch video after video)...

results.content:

results.content:
it was perfect until the actual projects . He explains really good the concepts. Then it went a bit too fast and i like to code along. :) 
this is just me though. there are people who prefer this method.
otherwise it would be 5 stars.

results.content: Instructor is clear and easy to hear.  Short videos make it easy to stay focused.  The breakdowns of topic make it easy to follow and understand.
